com.camerontec.catalys.server.schedule

Interface IScheduler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Scheduler

    public interface IScheduler
    This object is used to schedule and unschedule tasks.

    There is normally only one of these objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds the given task to the scheduler with the given schedule.

      Get scheduled instance of given task.

      All IScheduledTasks currently in scheduler.
      boolean isSchedulerActive()
      An inactive scheduler does not run any tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • addScheduledTask

        void addScheduledTask(IScheduledTask scheduledTask)
               throws Exception
        Adds the given task to the scheduler with the given schedule.
        Parameters:
        scheduledTask - a task
        Throws:
        Exception - TBD

      • getNextScheduledTime

        long getNextScheduledTime(ITimeSpec timeSpec)
        Returns the next scheduled time of the given TimeSpec.

        Value returned is standard milliseconds since 1/1/1970. If the time spec is not currently scheduled, returns -1.

        Parameters:
        timeSpec - Time specification to check
        Returns:
        Time of next scheduled event or -1 if none.

      • getScheduledTask

        IScheduledTask getScheduledTask(ITask task)
        Get scheduled instance of given task.
        Parameters:
        task - a task
        Returns:
        Scheduled instance for given task. May be null.

      • getScheduledTasks

        Collection<IScheduledTask> getScheduledTasks()
        All IScheduledTasks currently in scheduler.
        Returns:
        Collection of IScheduledTask's.

      • isSchedulerActive

        boolean isSchedulerActive()
        An inactive scheduler does not run any tasks.
        Returns:
        True if active.

      • removeAll

        void removeAll()
        Removes all scheduled entries.

      • removeScheduledTask

        void removeScheduledTask(IScheduledTask scheduledTask)
        Removes the given scheduled task.
        Parameters:
        scheduledTask - a scheduled task

      • schedule

        void schedule(ITimeSpec timeSpec)
       throws Exception
        Schedules a single TimeSpec.
        Parameters:
        timeSpec - TimeSpec to be scheduled.
        Throws:
        Exception - TBD

      • setSchedulerActive

        void setSchedulerActive(boolean active)
                 throws Exception
        An inactive scheduler does not run any tasks.

        By default, a scheduler starts up as inactive.

        Parameters:
        active - whether to activate the scheduler
        Throws:
        Exception - TBD

      • unSchedule

        boolean unSchedule(ITimeSpec timeSpec)
        Removes the given TimeSpec from the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        timeSpec - TimeSpec to unschedule.
        Returns:
        True if the entry was found.

      • getResolution

        long getResolution()
        Return the underlying scheduler's resolution.

        When the resolution is greater than zero, the caller must take into account the fact that tasks may be scheduled up to the resolution interval before they are due.

        Returns:
        The underlying scheduler's resolution in milliseconds.
